mapper.insert: insert into shop(productId, title, image, lprice, maker) values(#{productId}, #{title}, #{image}, #{lprice}, #{maker})
mapper.select: select count(*) from shop where productId=#{productId}

select *, date_format(regdate, '%Y-%m-%d %T') fmtdate, format(lprice, 0) fmtprice from shop where title like concat("%",#{query},"%") or maker like concat("%",#{query},"%") order by pid desc limit #{start},#{size};
select count(*) from shop where title like concat("%",#{query},"%") or maker like concat("%",#{query},"%")
select r.pid, title, count(*) as count from review r, shop s where r.pid=s.pid group by pid order by pid asc;
mapper.delete: delete from favorite where uid=#{uid} and pid=#{pid}
mapper.select: select *, date_format(regdate, '%Y-%m-%d %T') fmtdate, format(lprice, 0) fmtprice, (select count(*) from favorite where uid=#{uid} and pid=#{pid}) ucnt from shop where pid=#{pid}
mapper.update: update shop set title=#{title}, lprice=#{lprice}, maker=#{maker} where pid=#{pid}
update shop set image=#{image} where pid=#{pid}
update shop set viewcnt = viewcnt + 1 where pid=#{pid}
update shop set fcnt=fcnt + #{amount} where pid=#{pid}
update shop set content=#{content} where pid=#{pid}
